long_description: Need a new swim top for good times at the beach or resort? Well-designed support and lines make the Lole Kapiti Bikini Top a flattering fit for the D-cup woman. Nylon/elastane tricot offers 4-way stretch, is highly resistant to chlorine and dries quickly. Adjustable straps can be worn crossed in back or straight over the shoulders. Soft cups are removable. Lole Kapiti D-cup bikini top can be worn with your choice of swimsuit bottoms.
short_description: Need a new swim top for good times at the beach or resort? Well-designed support and lines make the Lole Kapiti Bikini Top a flattering fit for the D-cup woman.
